import React, { useRef } from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { passwordRequest } from '../redux/actions/PasswordForget'; const PasswordForgot = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const emailRef = useRef(); const handleClick = () =>{ dispatch(passwordRequest()) } return (

); } export default PasswordForgot
